record.field: Imports on which VAT is not charged
Local Purchases on which VAT is not charged
Goods Purchased from Non VAT Registered Persons
Disallowable Input Tax on Imports, other Purchases and Adjustments
Disallowable Input Tax on Suspended Purchases
Allowable Input Tax excluding B/F Amounts

(LK_VAT_001E_9.balance_c * (LK_VAT_001E_C.balance_a + LK_VAT_001E_D.balance_a + LK_VAT_001E_D1.balance_a)) / (LK_VAT_001E_A.balance_a + LK_VAT_001E_A1.balance_a + LK_VAT_001E_A2.balance_a + LK_VAT_001E_B.balance_a + LK_VAT_001E_C.balance_a + LK_VAT_001E_D.balance_a + LK_VAT_001E_D1.balance_a)
Unabsorbed Excess Input Tax C/F to next Quarter
M: The aggregate Input Tax set off against VAT after 01/01/2011
N: The aggregate Input Tax set off against other taxes payable to CGIR
O: The aggregate input tax set off against taxes payable to DGC
P: Unabsorbed balance to be C/F
R1: Deemed Tax Credit (Strategic Development Project)
R2: Tax Credit based on SVAT Credit Voucher
R3: Deem Input on Wholesale and Retail (R3B+R3F)
R3B: Claimed Credit for the Period
R3E: Credit on purchases for the Period
R3F: Claimed Credit for the Period
S: Claim for this Period out of Cage L
S1A, S1B, S1C: The Input tax set off against other taxes payable to CGIR (IT/ESC/NBT)
S2: The Input tax set off against taxes payable to DGC
S3: Total claimed from Unabsorbed Input Tax
LK_VAT_001E_Q.balance_c + LK_VAT_001E_R.balance_c + LK_VAT_001E_R1.balance_c + LK_VAT_001E_R2.balance_c + LK_VAT_001E_R3.balance_c + LK_VAT_001E_S.balance_c
